attributes.action: The publication of all salaries and tax returns online
attributes.additional_details:
In Sweden, anyone can order a printed edition of the Taxation Calendar, which lists the earnings of people in mid-to-high-end income brackets.

In Britain in 2010, boardroom pay increased by 55% as FTSE 100 companies made job cuts elsewhere. In 2011, the government cut corporation tax whilst cutting benefits - and brought Phillip Green, a known tax avoider, into government to advise on waste.

This petititon calls for the full disclosure of salaries and taxation paid by the entire population, in the spirit of both transparency and egalitarianism.
